org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class InfoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractManager
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.InfoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfoManager, IManager, INotifiableManager

    public class InfoManager
extends AbstractManager
implements IInfoManager, INotifiableManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
